traits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: The minotaur can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

actions.name: Gore
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1 damage) piercing damage. If the minotaur moved at least 10 feet straight toward the target immediately before it hit, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6 damage) piercing damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet from the minotaur and have the {@condition prone} condition.
